creditline: Gift of the Alfred K. Moir Trust
description: black and white with line of silver at top; abstract image with linear motifs with various thicknesses of lines--long thin lines and short fatter lines
provenance: the artist, New Orleans (from 1960; gave/sold to Moir); Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (before 1962-d. 2010; bequeathed to Condos); Barbara Moir Condos, Chevy Chase, Maryland (2010-12)
signed: LLC, in pencil: [Some Weeds]; LRC, in pencil: [ Kendall Shaw \'60]
title: Some Weeds
